biotools.summary: MDPbiome is a software developed in R that uses Markov Decision Processes to create "policy prescriptions" for microbiome engineering. MDPbiome performs a variety of analysis describing the robustness of the prescription, as well as a variety of visualizations to assist in manual interpretation of the state transitions and biological understanding of a microbiome's dynamics.
